main.name: Rafid Akhter
main.description: I am  self-motivated and creative individual, interested in artificial intelligence and software engineering.Currently pursuing a career in this field and actively looking for software developer position.
main.bio: Hi, I am Rafid. I have graduated with a mechanical engineering degree from Carleton University in 2017 and I am a self-taught programmer. After graduation I have worked with Canadian Coast Guards, Environment Canada, and Natural Resources Canada. My interest in programming is a direct result of my innate need to find efficient ways of solving problems, that resulted in countless automation projects both in academia and in industry.

resume.skillmessage: With a mechanical engineering background, I enjoyed doing mechatronics projects. My first personal project was to make my drone follow me while I am rock climbing. This project helped me to understand how computer vision is used for object detection, navigation and control systems. To further broaden my knowledge in core concepts of computer science and software engineering, I have taken online courses and learned advanced topics like data structures and algorithms, network communication protocol and web development.
